admreg: Middle East and North Africa,Middle East and North Africa

abstracts.cdata!:
The proceeds of the IDA Credit would
            help finance the following: (a) building and equipping 13
            new institutions: one secondary school teacher training
            college, three primary teacher training institutes for boys,
            three upper secondary level schools -multilateral of
            alternative vocational facilities, one agricultural training
            center, two vocational training centers, and three
            non-formal basic education centers; (b) equipping 9 existing
            institutions: three lower secondary schools, three upper
            secondary schools, and three primary teacher training
            institutes for girls; and (c) providing technical
            assistance: to administer the IDA-financed project, to
            modernize the Ministry of Education (UNDP-financed), and to
            implement the education program including the training of
            counterparts (UNDP and bilateral financed).
